channel.title: Hi does anyone no how to make the monsters have more than 0 hp?
channel.description: :confused:plz help i need to make my own server but all my monsters have 0 hp so i kill them in one will sumone plz tell me how to change this hp :P

item.title: Hi does anyone no how to make the monsters have more than 0 hp?
item.dc:creator: @george4930 george4930
item.description:
@george4930 wrote:

thanx m8
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 01:54:48 PM[/size][hr]it just says name then combat level then it says type but it dont have a health mark what do i do to change it so i can make it have 100 health

Read full topic

item.title: Hi does anyone no how to make the monsters have more than 0 hp?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Gamma Project Gamma
item.description:
@Project_Gamma wrote:

Open Npc.cfg right click open with note pad you will see this

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat--health npc = 3 Man 2 7

change combat or health

Read full topic
